name: Black '84
description: Black ’84, also known as UW Black ’84, is one of a few elusive strains that managed to escape from the medical cannabis garden at the University of Washington in the early and mid-1980s. Believed to descend from Afghani genetics, Black ‘84’s unknown indica lineage expresses itself as a stout, dark, and bushy plant. The aroma is a complex mix of sweet tropical flavors that blend with a smooth nutty finish. Its powerful, relaxing effects on the body make Black ’84 a great nighttime strain when combatting anxiety, pain, and insomnia.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Hungry, Euphoric, Stress, Insomnia, Pain, Depression, Cramps, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes
